text: Carla Lane (1928 - 31 May 2016)Liver Birds and Bread creator Carla Lane has died aged 87. Retrieved 31 May 2016 was an English television writer. She wrote many sitcoms, including The Liver Birds (co-creator, 1969–78), Butterflies (1978–82), and Bread (1986–91).Carla Lane Dies at BBC News.
